sentences.en: A new trickle of sweat formed and rolled down his back.
sentences.cn: 他背上又沁出了汗珠,往下直淌.

sentences.en: A tear trickled down the old man's cheek.
sentences.cn: 一滴泪水顺着老人的面颊流了下来。

sentences.en: A trickle of refugees began to flee the country.
sentences.cn: 难民开始三五成群地陆续逃离该国。

sentences.en: Emitters on trickle system can be blocked by precipatate.
sentences.cn: 沉淀使灌溉系统中的发射器发生被阻塞.

sentences.en: Emitters on trickle system can be blocked by precipitate.
sentences.cn: 灌溉系统中的发射器会被沉积物所堵塞.

sentences.en: He removed a trickle of sweat from the cornor of his neattemple.
sentences.cn: 他伸手到整齐的鬓角边上,抹去了挂在那里的一滴汗水.

sentences.en: Only a trickle of water came from the faucet.
sentences.cn: 只有一股细小的水流从龙头上滴淌下来.

sentences.en: She scooped up a handful of sand and let it trickle through her fingers.
sentences.cn: 她抓起一把沙子，让它从指缝里一点点漏下来。

sentences.en: The flood of cars has now slowed to a trickle.
sentences.cn: 汹涌的车流现在已经变得稀稀拉拉。

sentences.en: The stream had thinned down to a mere trickle.
sentences.cn: 小河越来越窄,最后变成了涓涓细流.

sentences.en: The stream has thinned down to a mere trickle.
The water in the stream had been reduced to a trickle.
sentences.cn: 小溪里的水已只剩下一股细流。

sentences.en: There was a trickle of blood from the wound.
Trickle irrigation conservers water where limited.
sentences.cn: 滴灌在水少的地方应用起来可省水.

sentences.en: Trickle water gently over the back of your baby's head.
sentences.cn: 往婴儿的脑后部轻撩些水。

sentences.en: Water began to trickle into his yard.
sentences.cn: 水开始慢慢地流进了他家的院里.

words.tran_cn: 滴；细细地流；慢慢地移动

trans.tran_cn: 滴，涓流，细流，稀稀疏疏缓慢来往的东西
trans.tran_en: a thin slow flow of liquid

trans.tran_cn: 滴，细细地流，使淌下，慢慢地移动
trans.tran_en: if liquid trickles somewhere, it flows slowly in drops or in a thin stream
if liquid trickles somewhere, it flows slowly in drops or in a thin stream
